abstract: Op-Ed article by former Secretary of State George P Shultz disputes characterization of Pres Ronald Reagan as weak and struggling in Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard book Killing Reagan: The Violent Assault That Changed a Presidency; describes his close relationship with Reagan and suggests book does great disservice to former president's legacy.
lead_paragraph: The book “Killing Reagan” may significantly damage the public’s memory of one of our greatest presidents.

headline.main: What Bill O’Reilly Gets Wrong About Ronald Reagan

snippet: The book “Killing Reagan” may significantly damage the public’s memory of one of our greatest presidents.

keywords.value: Killing Reagan: The Violent Assault That Changed a Presidency (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
